QuestData.Title: Seedbearers of Bad News
QuestData.Description: When these seedbearers are slain their seeds survive. From them spring new seedbearers, not over years, but hours.$b$bLeaving their remains here would soon cause the outpost to be overrun.$b$bWe have learned that burning their remains prevents this from happening.
QuestData.RewardText: The ancients should not be a problem for your outpost for some time.
